name: @machinacore/machinacoreui
description: UI Kit built on top of Bootstrap 4

scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/coreui.scss dist/css/coreui.css
scripts.css-compile-bootstrap: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/bootstrap.scss dist/css/bootstrap.css
scripts.css-compile-standalone: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/coreui-standalone.scss dist/css/coreui-standalone.css
scripts.css-compile-templates-dark-blue: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/themes/dark-blue/coreui.scss dist/css/themes/coreui-dark-blue.css
scripts.css-compile-templates-dark-cyan: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/themes/dark-cyan/coreui.scss dist/css/themes/coreui-dark-cyan.css
scripts.css-compile-templates-dark-orange: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/themes/dark-orange/coreui.scss dist/css/themes/coreui-dark-orange.css
scripts.css-compile-templates-light-blue: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/themes/light-blue/coreui.scss dist/css/themes/coreui-light-blue.css
scripts.css-compile-templates-light-indigo: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/themes/light-indigo/coreui.scss dist/css/themes/coreui-light-indigo.css
scripts.css-compile-templates-light-purple: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/themes/light-purple/coreui.scss dist/css/themes/coreui-light-purple.css
scripts.css-compile-templates-light-pink: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/themes/light-pink/coreui.scss dist/css/themes/coreui-light-pink.css
scripts.css-compile-templates-light-red: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/themes/light-red/coreui.scss dist/css/themes/coreui-light-red.css
scripts.css-compile-templates-light-orange: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/themes/light-orange/coreui.scss dist/css/themes/coreui-light-orange.css
scripts.css-compile-templates-light-yellow: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/themes/light-yellow/coreui.scss dist/css/themes/coreui-light-yellow.css
scripts.css-compile-templates-light-green: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/themes/light-green/coreui.scss dist/css/themes/coreui-light-green.css
scripts.css-compile-templates-light-teal: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/themes/light-teal/coreui.scss dist/css/themes/coreui-light-teal.css
scripts.css-compile-templates-light-cyan: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/themes/light-cyan/coreui.scss dist/css/themes/coreui-light-cyan.css
scripts.css-compile-templates-light-white: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/themes/light-white/coreui.scss dist/css/themes/coreui-light-white.css
scripts.css-compile-templates-light-gray: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/themes/light-gray/coreui.scss dist/css/themes/coreui-light-gray.css
scripts.release-zip: cd dist/ && zip -r9 coreui-$npm_package_version-dist.zip * && shx mv coreui-$npm_package_version-dist.zip ..
scripts.watch-js: nodemon --ignore js/dist --ignore dist/ -e js -x "npm-run-all js-compile* js-minify*"
